SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractCell<S,R,C>
Abstract base class for sheet cells.
AbstractRow<S,R,C>
Abstract base class for implementations of the Row interface.
AbstractSheet<S,R,C>
The AbstractSheet class represents the abstract base class for a sheet in a spreadsheet.
AbstractWorkbook<S,R,C>
Abstract base class for implementations of the Workbook interface.
BorderStyle
Definition of a cell border.
Cell
A single cell of a sheet.
Cell.CellException
The CellException class is an exception that extends the IllegalStateException class.
CellEditor
The CellEditor interface defines the methods used for editing cell content in a table, spreadsheet, or similar UI component.
CellEditorPane
A custom text pane for editing cell content with support for styling, alignment, and rendering specific to spreadsheet-like cells.
CellRenderer
The CellRenderer class is responsible for rendering cells in a SheetView.
CellStyle
Definition of a cell style.
CellStyle.StandardDataFormats
Enumeration of standard data formats.
CellType
Definition of cell types.
CellValueHelper
The CellValueHelper class is used to set cell values in various formats, such as numbers, dates, booleans, and text.
CsvWorkbookReader
The CsvWorkbookReader class is a concrete implementation of the abstract WorkbookReader class.
CsvWorkbookWriter
The CsvWorkbookWriter class is a concrete implementation of the WorkbookWriter interface.
DbMejaUtil
Utility class for using Meja with JDBC.
DefaultCellEditor
Default implementation for cell editor.
Direction
Direction.
Event<T>
Represents a generic event with a source of type T.
Event.AbstractEvent<T>
Abstract base class for events.
Event.EventIntValueChanged<T>
Represents an abstract event where an integer value has changed.
Event.EventValueChanged<T,V>
Represents an event where a value change has occurred.
Event.EventWithIndex<T>
The EventWithIndex class extends AbstractEvent and provides an additional index attribute.
FileFormatException
The FileFormatException class represents an exception that is thrown when there is an issue with the file format or corrupted data in a file.
FileTypeCsv
File type for CSV files.
FileTypeExcel
FileType for reading Excel files.
FileTypeHtml
A FileType instance for HTML files.
FileTypeWorkbook<W>
Abstract base class for workbook filetypes.
FileTypeXls
File type for Excel 97-2003 .XLS files.
FileTypeXlsx
File type for Excel .XLSX files.
FillPattern
Fill patterns for setting the background of cells.
FxMejaUtil
Utility class for integrating Meja with JavaFX.
FxRow
A custom cell implementation for rendering rows in a spreadsheet.
FxRow.FxRowGraphics
A container for rendering graphical content of a row in a sheet view.
FxRow.Index
The Index class is a record representing the position of a row within a table or sheet-like structure.
FxSegmentView
FxSegmentView is a JavaFX control that implements the SegmentView interface, representing a view of a segment of a sheet focused within a specific quadrant.
FxSheetView
The FxSheetView class is responsible for rendering a spreadsheet-like UI component, using four quadrants to manage visible data sections efficiently.
FxSheetViewDelegate
Represents a delegate specific to the FxSheetView, extending the general functionality provided by the SheetViewDelegate class.
FxWorkbookView
Swing component for displaying instances of class Workbook.
GenericCell
Implementation of the Cell interface for GenericSheet.
GenericCellStyle
Implementation of the CellStyle interface for GenericSheet.
GenericRow
Implementation of the Row interface for GenericSheet.
GenericSheet
A generic implementation of Sheet.
GenericWorkbook
Generic implementation of Workbook.
GenericWorkbookFactory
A Factory for creating instances of GenericWorkbook.
HAlign
Horizontal alignment.
HtmlWorkbookWriter
HtmlWorkbookWriter is a class that implements the WorkbookWriter interface.
IteratorAdapter<T,D>
A helper class to convert iterators of derived classes to iterators of base classes.
MejaHelper
Helper class.
MejaHelper.PrintOptions
Options controlling print output in text format.
MejaSwingHelper
Helper class.
ObservableSheet
ObservableSheet is a wrapper around a Sheet that implements an observable list of Rows.
PoiCell
Concrete subclass of AbstractCell for Apache POI based workbooks.
PoiCellStyle
A CellStyle implementation for Apache POI based workbooks.
PoiFont
A class that wraps Font instances and provides mappings to the Font class.
PoiHelper
Utility class for the Apache POI implementation.
PoiRow
Concrete Implementation of AbstractRow for Apache POI based workbooks.
PoiSheet
POI implementation of the Sheet interface.
PoiWorkbook
Implementation of the Workbook interface based on the Apache POI implementation.
PoiWorkbook.PoiHssfWorkbook
Concrete implementation of PoiWorkbook for HSSF-workbooks (the old Excel format).
PoiWorkbook.PoiXssfWorkbook
Implementation of PoiWorkbook for workbooks using the XSSF format.
PoiWorkbookFactory
A WorkbookFactory implementation for creating workbooks based on the Apache POI implementation.
RectangularRegion
A rectangular region.
RefOption
Options for generating CellRef.
Row
A single row of a sheet.
SearchOptions
Search options.
SearchSettings
A record representing the settings for a search operation.
SegmentView
The SegmentView interface defines an interface views that display a segment of a sheet, defined by one of the four SheetView.Quadrant of the sheet.
SegmentViewDelegate
This class serves as a delegate for the SegmentView and is responsible for managing its visualization, layout calculations, and interactions with the associated SheetViewDelegate.
SettingsDialog
A dialog box for setting options.
Sheet
An interface representing a single sheet of a workbook.
SheetEvent
SheetEvent is an interface that extends the Event class for handling various events related to a Sheet object.
SheetEvent.ActiveCellChanged
Event triggered when the active cell within a sheet changes.
SheetEvent.CellChanged<V>
Represents an event that is triggered when a cell in a sheet changes.
SheetEvent.CellStyleChanged
Event class representing a change in a cell's style within a sheet.
SheetEvent.CellValueChanged
The CellValueChanged represents an event that indicates that the value of a cell in a sheet has changed.
SheetEvent.ColumnsAdded
Event representing the addition of columns to a sheet.
SheetEvent.LayoutChanged
The LayoutChanged class represents an event indicating that the layout of a Sheet has been changed.
SheetEvent.RowsAdded
Event representing the addition of rows to a sheet.
SheetEvent.SplitChanged
The SplitChanged class represents an event that indicates a change in the split settings of a Sheet.
SheetEvent.ZoomChanged
Class representing a zoom change event for a Sheet.
SheetPainter
A helper class that implements the actual drawing algorithm.
SheetRowBuilder
Implementation of the CsvReader.RowBuilder interface that appends new rows for an existing sheet.
SheetView
The SheetView interface represents a user interface view of a spreadsheet.
SheetView.Actions
Actions for key bindings.
SheetView.Quadrant
Represents the quadrant of a sheet view.
SheetView.SheetArea
Defines a rectangular area of cells in a sheet.
SheetViewDelegate
A delegate that combines basic data and functionality for SheetView implementations.
SwingSheetView
Swing component for displaying instances of Sheet.
SwingSheetViewDelegate
The SwingSheetViewDelegate class is responsible for managing the interaction and rendering logic for a SwingSheetView in the context of a given Sheet.
SwingWorkbookView
Swing component for displaying instances of class Workbook.
TableOptions
The TableOptions enum represents the options that can be used when creating a table model.
VAlign
Vertical Alignment.
Workbook
Workbook class.
WorkbookEvent
Interface representing various events that can occur within a workbook.
WorkbookEvent.ActiveSheetChanged
Event sent when the active sheet changes.
WorkbookEvent.SheetAdded
Event sent when a sheet is added to the workbook.
WorkbookEvent.SheetRemoved
Event sent when a sheet is removed from the workbook.
WorkbookEvent.UriChanged
Event sent when the workbook URI changes.
WorkbookFactory<WORKBOOK>
Abstract base class for workbook factories.
WorkbookReader
Abstract base class for reading workbook data.
WorkbookView<SV>
The WorkbookView interface represents a user interface view for a workbook.
WorkbookWriter
Abstract base class for writing workbook data.
XlsWorkbookWriter
Implementation of WorkbookWriter for Excel files in the old ".xls"-format.
XlsxWorkbookWriter
Implementation of WorkbookWriter for Excel files in the new ".xlsx"-format.
